mapper.select: select a.user_id, b.project_id, b.project_name from projectmember a join (select project_id, project_name, state_code from project ) b on a.project_id = b.project_id where a.user_id = #{user_id}
select a.user_id, b.project_id, b.project_name from projectmember a join (select project_id, project_name, state_code from project ) b on a.project_id = b.project_id where a.project_id = #{projectId}
